questions.text: What fictional world would you take a date to?

answers.value: Hogwarts — casting flirty spells in the Forbidden Forest.
Middle-earth — hiking the Shire with second breakfasts.
Cyberpunk city — hacking the skyline for a neon date.
Anime world — cosplaying as sidekicks in a Ghibli forest.

questions.text: How do you respond to 'wyd?' texts?

answers.value: Crafting a flirty haiku in my Notes app.
Brewing kombucha and overanalyzing your last message.
Building a robot that sends better replies than me.
Sketching your vibe in my bullet journal.

questions.text: What's your idea of romantic revenge?

answers.value: Posting my bonsai thriving better than their vibes.
Winning at disc golf and dedicating it to my ex.
Sending a playlist of breakup songs I composed.
Collecting rare coins and flexing my better investments.

questions.text: Which nerdy debate could you argue for hours?

answers.value: Marvel vs. DC — my comic collection backs my argument.
Best board game strategy — I've got spreadsheets.
Is time travel ethical? I'll cite sci-fi novels.
Analog vs. digital photography — I'm team film.

questions.text: What's something low-key romantic you do?

answers.value: Saving your favorite flower in my pressed collection.
Brewing you a custom tea blend for cozy nights.
Planning a stargazing date with my telescope.
Knitting you a scarf with secret flirty patterns.

questions.text: If love was a video game, what's your special ability?

answers.value: Crafting perfect date plans with +50% charm.
Geocaching your heart with precision accuracy.
Mixing flirty cocktails for instant vibe boosts.
Casting spells of wit from my favorite books.

questions.text: What is your most treasured memory with a loved one?

Exploring a new trail and finding a hidden spot.

Building a gadget that plays our song.

questions.text: If you could spend a day in any movie, which one?
